About the Company: OLYMPIC CARDS LIMITED. They company is the Manufacturer and Supplier of Invitation cards for all occasions. The company provides best quality cards as well as well crafted kudhan meena works and also high quality printing services covering all segments of field. The Founder Mr.N.M.Habibullah, and the Chairman-Managing Director Mr. H.Noor Mohamed, is tycoons in printing Industry with 46 years of experience. A dedicated, talented and Well Determined Young generation is behind them for innovations.
